entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
